channel.title: Modules on tweakflow - an expression language for the JVM
channel.description: Recent content in Modules on tweakflow - an expression language for the JVM

item.title: std.tf
item.description: module std.tf The standard module contains basic functions for general computing tasks. All samples run in the interactive tweakflow REPL which you can launch using: java -jar tweakflow-0.9.0.jar repl library core The core library contains utility functions to process values at a basic level. id (any x) -> any Identity function. Returns x. > core.id("foo") "foo" > core.id({:a "b"}) { :a "b" } > core.id(nil) nil inspect (x) -> string
